title: Fireside with the Underboss - How the Mob Rigged a Presidential Election
description: Sammy spreads light on the mob's involvement during the Kennedy Era and he worked directly with the Chicago outfit. Their influence made a tremendous impact on JFK's rise to Presidency.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy spreads light on the mob's involvement during the Kennedy Era and he worked directly with the Chicago outfit. Their influence made a tremendous impact on JFK's rise to Presidency.
